
recover 1 mp: takes 32 frames (for dart at least)
dart: costs 3 mp

backdash+dart (uses backdash+slide while recovering mp):
  blank0: (13784+11736)/2 = 12760; (12760*2 + 11350*(3*32-2))/(3*32) = 11379.375
  blank1: (13784+13232+11184)/3 = 38200/3 (=12733.3333); (38200/3*3 + 11350*(3*32-3))/(3*32) = 11393.2292
  blank2: (13784+13232+12680+10632)/4 = 12582; (12582*4 + 11350*(3*32-4))/(3*32) = 11401.3333
  blank3: (13784+13232+12680+12128+10080)/5 = 12380.8; (12380.8*5 + 11350*(3*32-5))/(3*32) = 11403.6875
  blank4: (13784+13232+12680+12128+11576+9528)/6 = 72928/6 (=12154.6667); (72928/6*6 + 11350*(3*32-6))/(3*32) = 11400.2917
backdash+slide:
  (13784+13232+12680+12128+11576+11024+10472+9920+11968+11648+11328+11008+10688+10368+10048+9728) / 16 = 11350
backdash+jump:
  (13784+13232+12680+12128+11576+11024+10472+9920+9368+8816+8264+7712+13784+13232+12680+12128+11576) / 17 = 11316.2353
backdash+crouch:
  (13784+13232+12680+12128+11576+11024+8624+0) / 8 = 10381
